channel.title: Outlaw Punk Cowboy Show
channel.itunes:author: Bubba
channel.description: If you like your Pixies in a crunched-up cowboy hat and Hank Williams on speed then come and spend sometime in the double-wide trailer at space #29 of the Western Winds Trailer Village with the Outlaw Punk Podcast. Cheif Bubba, head honcho, unloads six shooters full of CowPunk, Swampscat, Southern Rock, and more Americana Rock'n Country rebel style. Bubba will shoot down the typical alt.country town drunk, right between the eyes with a stray bullet. Sit on the couch and tap to the beat on your beer can. Take the wicked twisted road to Outlaw Punk for the only PodShow+ Country that is your Grandpa's country music. Grandpa on Viagra/Ritalin Dancing to the Wiggles! Call any time from any phone, anywhere using this number: 1(641)715-0101 Code: *5516749 to let Bubba know what you think.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Twangtastic Countrypolitan Ya'llternative!
channel.itunes:summary: Outlaw Punk serves Podshow+ as a guide to the best of Ya'llternative, Trashcan Americana, CowPunk, Rockabilly, GuerillaGrass, Hick Hop, Redneck Metal
channel.itunes:keywords: yallternative, redneck, metal, country, rock, trashcan, americana, Outlaw, altcountry

Cowboy to the spiked wristbands and green hair punks. This is not the
kind of music for two-step'n too, but for kick'n the mud on the four-
wheeler and digging down to find the last cold beer in the cooler.
